alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron; Coastal Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 23 at 6:01AM CST until December 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 33 possible. * WHERE...Inland Cameron, Coastal Willacy and Coastal Cameron Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until noon CST today. For the Wind Advisory, until 6 AM CST early this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
